com.compendium.ui.popups
Class UIDropFolderPopupMenu

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPopupMenu
                  com.compendium.ui.popups.UIDropFolderPopupMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.event.PopupMenuListener, javax.swing.MenuElement
public class UIDropFolderPopupMenu
extends javax.swing.JPopupMenu
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, javax.swing.event.PopupMenuListener

Popup menu for when user drops a folder into the map. Simulates modal behaviour on show().

Author:
rudolf
